content.question: Napoleonâ€™s efforts to limit civil rights and restrict domestic opposition are best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The need to maintain a unified France in the face of continued resistance by other European powers to his imperial conquests
The desire to create an absolute monarchy modeled on the Bourbon dynasty
The desire to appear as an upholder of Enlightenment political models
The need to suppress internal opposition to the state-sponsored Cult of the Supreme Being

content.answer: The need to maintain a unified France in the face of continued resistance by other European powers to his imperial conquests

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
